gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Magic 117, Pacers 110
gameRecap.excerpt: The Magic defeated the Pacers, 117-110. Paolo Banchero led the way for the Magic with 34 points, seven rebounds and four assists, while Franz Wagner added 24 points and six rebounds in the victory. Tyrese Haliburton tallied 29 points and 14 assists for the Pacers in the losing effort. The Magic snap a 4-game losing streak as they improve to 17-11 on the season, while the Pacers fall to 14-14.
